name: Shahzeb Akhtar
title: Full Stack Developer
about: Experienced developer specializing in modern web technologies, passionate about building scalable and performant applications.

projects.name: EZ-Reminder System
projects.description: Led frontend development, building campaigns, templates, and workflows for improved user functionality. Created interfaces for contact and workspace management.

projects.name: EzHubSpot (Workforce Management)
projects.description: Designed and implemented core modules for time tracking, payroll automation, attendance, and leave requests. Built real-time user monitoring.

projects.name: Medical Referral System
projects.description: Developed a dynamic user interface, integrated backend APIs, and customized Mapbox for location-based interactions with draggable fields.

projects.name: Customer Relationship Management
projects.description: Designed responsive UI for deals, boards, staff management, and analytics. Integrated Apex Charts for visualization and drag-and-drop functionality.

projects.name: RCM (Revenue Cycle Management)
projects.description: Contributed to a multi-modular medical billing system covering patient registration, insurance verification, claim submission, and payment posting.

projects.name: Tipz (Customer Portal)
projects.description: Built a portal for customers to send tips to barbers. Integrated Stripe for secure payments, ensuring a smooth tipping experience.

projects.name: Tipz-Admin (Admin Panel)
projects.description: Developed a dashboard for barbershops to view received tips, track amounts, and review customer feedback with analytics.

projects.name: TCA (Voucher App)
projects.description: Developed a voucher management app where users can apply vouchers by scanning QR codes or entering codes with trip history tracking.

projects.name: Ez SignDocu (E-Sign Platform)
projects.description: Built a secure e-signature platform enabling users to upload, sign, and manage documents digitally with real-time status tracking.

projects.name: Servr (Hotel Management)
projects.description: Developed a hotel management solution covering booking, check-in/check-out, room availability, customer profiles, and billing.

projects.name: Drive-Vip-Cars (Ride Booking)
projects.description: Built a responsive ride-booking site where users can schedule and manage rides with smooth booking flow and mobile-friendly design.

projects.name: A2B Tommyfield (Ride Booking)
projects.description: Developed a ride-booking platform with clean and intuitive UI/UX for seamless ride scheduling and management.
